title: Binding Fire
description: Princess Ahriana's life is no fairy tale. She has no prince, no happy kingdom, only tragedy and half formed legends. The Magic that rules her people decided her destiny long ago and since birth Ahriana has been determined to somehow deny the course of fate. But it will not be thwarted easily. The strings of prophecy are tightening their hold, forcing her into the role she never wanted. The Magic is determined Ahriana will become the sword that strikes down the dark power ruling the world. No matter the sacrifice. No matter the cost.Book description from Amazon.
author: Elizabeth Cooper
